is_decimal: $t(translation.{property}) is not a valid decimal number
is_in: $t(translation.{property}) must be one of the following values: {constraints.0}
min_length: $t(translation.{property}) must be at least {constraints.0} characters long
is_username: $t(translation.{property}) must not start with a digit, contain a space, and only special characters allowed are . and _
is_strong_password: $t(translation.{property}) must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, one special character and must be at least 8 characters long
each_is_string: each value in $t(translation.{property}) must be a string
each_is_uuid: each value in $t(translation.{property}) must be a UUID
is_enum: $t(translation.{property}) must be one of the following values: {enum}
is_iso_date_string: $t(translation.{property}) is invalid date-time format. Expected format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ
min: $t(translation.{property}) must be greater than or equal to {constraints.0}
is_phone_number: $t(translation.{property}) must be a valid phone number
